Project Description
Hope that everybody continue to develop it.

The project can be automatically arrange panel in window, if the window size changes, the element will automatically change.

1. You can click on any element, the element will be enlarged and other elements will be placed on the right;
2. If you click any element in right group, the element will be enlarged and the original elements will be placed on the right;
3. If you click main element, all elements will be restored position.

I'll add comment in the project late, pls wait for a moment.

If you have any suggest, pls let me know.
